li.a: Standard Response Protocol - I Love You Guys Foundation training

div.span: *Preventative School Closure* Access online instruction links by clicking the white lines to the right of the school logo on the home page for mobile users or black bar on full site. Click on "Online Instruction" Check the links daily for your student's lessons*****Grape Creek ISD will offer remote instruction to students for the remainder of the school year. Facilities will not reopen for instruction.*****

h3.a: GCISD to Offer Remote Instruction for Remainder of School Year

article.div: Click here for a letter from your Superintendent.
During the COVID-19 pandemic, it’s easier than ever to apply for benefits. https://yourtexasbenefits.hhsc.texas.gov/programs/snap
Beginning Monday (04-20) the Grape Creek ISD school nurses will begin contacting parents in order to schedule a time for picking up any remaining student medication. Thank you!!

h3.a: An updated message from our Superintendent - April 11, 2020 ( CLICK HERE TO VIEW)
Companies offering Free Internet Services to students (Click Here)

article.div: The Texas Cable Association released information on free broadband and internet services here, describing steps to enable and expand access to broadband. All four Texas Cable Association members have pledged to not cut off broadband or telephone service to any customers, even those unable to pay their bills; waive late fees incurred because of their economic circumstances related to the coronavirus pandemic; and open their Wi-Fi hotspots to all.

h3.a: COVID-19 Mental & Behavioral Health Grief & Trauma Informed Virtual Support and Statewide Resources List April 3, 2020

article.div: As our student's, staff, families, and community continue to deal with the COVID-19 outbreak, Grape Creek ISD recognizes that our students, staff, families and community may be struggling with stress, anxiety, grief, and loss. A list of statewide resources that can help with specific needs during this time can be found by clicking on the title above. (Please click on the Headline of this announcement to access a list of resources compiled and provided on the website of the Texas Education Agency)
